title: Rounded sans serif font
content:
Hello,

Can you please help me identify this font? Thanks a lot in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062408im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rounded_5372.png)

Font: 

 Dosis 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062408/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: fausto

comments.content: Looks like Edgar Tolentino's [Dosis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062408/http:/www.impallari.com/dosis) for me.
Agree. Even if the samples I found online show a bit more modulation in the strokes. Maybe the sample is manually emboldened.
